Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add comprehensive code review report

This report provides an in-depth analysis of the entire DataWarehouse
codebase including SDK, Kernel, and 104+ plugins. Key findings:

- Architecture match: ~70% of described microkernel design implemented
- Critical issues: HSM integrations are simulations, database plugins
  are in-memory only, 50+ empty catch blocks
- Production readiness: Individual tier ready, SMB/Enterprise/Hyperscale
  tiers NOT ready
- Competitive analysis: Can compete with deprecated projects \(MinIO,
  GlusterFS\), cannot compete with hyperscalers or enterprise vendors

Includes specific file:line references for all identified issues and
prioritized recommendations for reaching production readiness.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Implement real database operations and fix GeoReplication plugin

- Delete DatabaseInfrastructure.cs \(obsolete\)
- EmbeddedDatabasePlugin: Replace stub SQLite methods with real
  Microsoft.Data.Sqlite implementations, remove InMemory engine
- RelationalDatabasePlugin: Replace stub ADO.NET methods with real
  implementations for MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server, SQLite,
  remove InMemory engine
- GeoReplicationPlugin: Add StartAsync/StopAsync lifecycle methods
  following FederationPlugin pattern
- Create GeoReplicationManager.cs with region management, health
  monitoring, conflict resolution, and consistency level support

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
